Draw bent arrows from one point set to another

add_bent_arrows_xy.Rd

Draw bent arrows from one point set to another

Usage

add_bent_arrows_xy(
  xy_launch,
  xy_land,
  M,
  mnwd = 0.05,
  bbend = 0,
  endd = 0.75,
  adj = 2,
  clr = "red"
)

Arguments

xy_launch

origin point set

xy_land

destination point set

M

the dispersal matrix

mnwd

the minimum width to plot

bbend

a parameter to bend arrows

endd

relative position of arrowhead

adj

set the maximum cex for points

clr

the color

Value

invisible(NULL)

On this page
